content: this free sunflower pin pattern has been written to raise awareness for the symbol of the sunflower as allyship to those with hidden disabilities beginner friendly you can make this pattern with any yarn/hook combination that you prefer however this will impact the final size of your pin to have the right size for pinning to bags and lanyards i crochet this using 4ply crochet thread and a 2mm hook only small amounts of yarn are needed so this is a great scrap buster project materials needed -chosen yarn two colours i e brown and yellow -hook size appropriate for your yarn -scissors -yarn needle - optional hot glue gun - optional safety pin for more information about the hidden disability sunflower please see https //hdsunflower com/
